{{Infobox battle item |name = Black Glasses |image = [[File:Black_Glasses.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Black Glasses''. |location =
*[[Black Glasses#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Black Glasses''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Dark_Type_icon.png|30px]] Dark type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Team Rockets Hideout|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
